document.full_text: delaware governor jack markell is expected to sign into law a bill that will make the state the eighth to recognize civil unions for same-sex couples, his office said on friday.
document.title: delaware to be eighth state to recognize gay civil unions
lines_and_colors: delaware governor jack markell is expected to sign into law a bill that will make the state the eighth to recognize civil unions for same-sex couples, his office said on friday.
